title: BRIEF-Sayona Mining Enters Into A Controlled Placement Agreement With Acuity Capital
text:
BRIEF-Sayona Mining Enters Into A Controlled Placement Agreement With Acuity Capital

Commodities 17 minutes ago (Oct 29, 2019 17:00)

BRIEF-Sayona Mining Enters Into A Controlled Placement Agreement With Acuity Capital Oct 29 (Reuters) - Sayona Mining Ltd : * ENTERED INTO A CONTROLLED PLACEMENT AGREEMENT (CPA) WITH ACUITY CAPITAL * CPA PROVIDES SAYONA WITH UP TO $3 MILLION OF STANDBY EQUITY CAPITAL OVER PERIOD TO 31 JANUARY 2022

BRIEF-Sayona Mining Enters Into A Controlled Placement Agreement With Acuity Capital
description: BRIEF-Sayona Mining Enters Into A Controlled Placement Agreement With Acuity Capital
